ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Unable to build Heritrix by maven

Hi Carolyn,

one of the issues seems to be the one reported over here:
http://webteam.archive.org/jira/browse/HER-1221

Regards
  Olaf Freyer

Carolyn schrieb:
> 
> 
> Hello,
>  
> I have a problem: I failed to build Heritrix by maven.
>  
> Heritrix(selftest) can run successfully in ecilpse, but maven failed to 
> build the project. There are several junit testcases failed, and though 
> "target/distributions" and "target/generated-xdocs" are created, nothing 
> is generated in them.
>  
> I think I may have made some mistakes for the configuration of Heritrix 
> or Maven, maybe you can help me to find solutions to the problem. Thanks 
> so much.
>  
> Here are the messages which are printed by maven:
